title: Can anyone ID this font for me????
content:
Its the main font for Shantaram.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317195748im_/http:/typophile.com/files/shantaram_4540.jpg)

Many thanks in advance for helping ID this font!

Have a great day,

Kiya  
Filmmaker/Writer
author: Kiya
